title: Scp 8642 25
content:
For the THIRD time, you stubbornly pick the EXACT SAME choices that led you here. You’re beginning to question whether or not you have free will. It feels like some outside force is making you pick the same choices over, and over, and over again…

Eventually you come to this screen:

[[div class="sexy-box"]]

You once again pick all the exact same choices you’ve picked twice before. Eventually you come to this screen:

[[div class="sexy-box"]]

You click through the choices laid out before you, following the exact path of choices that led you here. Eventually you come to this screen:

[[div class="sexy-box"]]

A chill runs down your spine as you realize that the page up on the computer is describing exactly what you were doing when you showed up at this department. What’s going on? How did they set this up? Did they even set this up? You suppose it’s not the most impossible thing in the world of the SCP Foundation, probably not even top ten, but seeing something like this involving you specifically…

You look again at the computer monitor. The two choices at the bottom of the page call out to you, silently compelling you to choose one. You think back to all the choices you made since you were standing outside those doors. How many would lead you somewhere else? How many would lead you right back here? Your hand trembles as you lay it on the mouse and glide the cursor down towards the two choices. Taking a deep breath, you decide to…

||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/23 Follow the path that led you here.]||= 22||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/27 Pick different paths.]||

[[/div]]

Once again, you are faced with the choice to either pick the exact same choices that you did before, or to try different paths and get different endings. Considering these two options, you decide to…

||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/24 Continue picking all the same choices.]||= 23||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/27 Try different choices.]||

[[/div]]

You’ve already looped through the same choices twice. Surely, this time you will…

||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/25 Continue the loop!]||= 24||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/27 Break the loop!]||

[[/div]]

Now, are you just going to keep looping the same decisions, or are you going to break the loop?

||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/26 Keep looping!!!]||= 25||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/27 Break the loop!!!]||

author: TopHatBionicle
